Package net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.binding

Contains the API for data-binding of the user-interface.

See: Description

Package net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.binding Description

Contains the API for data-binding of the user-interface.

Client UI API Binding

This package contains the API for data-binding of the user-interface. It allows comfortable data-binding for complex widgets and forms via createAndBind. The data-binding can be customized by replacing UiDataBindingFactory.
